thread.title: Chelsea Emerge Victorious From Stoke’s Thunderdome
thread.title_full: Chelsea Emerge Victorious From Stoke’s Thunderdome

author: LondonIsBluePodcast
title: Chelsea Emerge Victorious From Stoke’s Thunderdome
text: ✕ Chelsea Emerge Victorious From Stoke’s Thunderdome At the bet365 stadium, two teams entered, but only one team left with all three points. London is Blue Podcast reviews how Chelsea vanquished their Master Blaster, Stoke. Photo by Tony Marshall/Getty Images London is Blue are... Nick Verlaney, @nickverlaney Special Guest, Stamford Chidge, @stamfordchidge , head of the Chelsea Supporters Trust and host of the Chelsea Fancast. Listen In We. Shall. Not. We. Shall. Not. Be. Moved. After a late, late atonement by Gary Cahill for the softest of penalty calls – you could have used it as bath tissue – Chelsea claimed maximum points against Stoke. As Dan is out adventuring in Italy, we were joined by Stamford Chidge to recap the match, discuss the going-ons with the Supporters Trust, and answer your questions. Housekeeping Leave us an iTunes review ! We love connecting with more Chelsea listeners from around the globe, and this is on the best ways for us to reach more of them! Thanks to those who left them from last week. How to Listen
